comments.body: All these options are optional, because they can also be specified in meta tags: https://developer.apple.com/documentation/sign_in_with_apple/sign_in_with_apple_js/configuring_your_webpage_for_sign_in_with_apple#3235722
The error type of a promise can't be specified, and it will never resolve with the error, so having the type specified doesn't do anything.
